Reviews.Title: “Very Disappointed!”
Reviews.Author: Marilyn M
Reviews.Content: reading exceptional reviews hotel husband decided stay disappointed arrival information hotel offerthe price paid 5 day stay ridiculously considering lack facilities available found staff unhelpful morning told available breakfast despite breakfast supposed available didnt leave hotel 730 admittedly clean modern hotel definitely overpriced

Reviews.Title: “Not as good as it used to be maybe?”
Reviews.Author: denboy69
Reviews.Content: recently stayed night hotel enjoy stay arrived hotel late afternoon short time change meet friends dinner bath plug wouldnt drain called downstairs told eventually water drain plug looked iron press shirt dinner desk else hotel cleaning staff left hotel iron persisted called manager phone manager basically laughed services time night 530 afternoon sat week crew stayed baileys hotel rome kept secret rome baileys hotel cheaper location proximity spanish steps maybe hotel obviously changed
